name: Waveformidable
description:
Keyboard Keys - ▴▾◂▸z x

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2017. The theme was "waves". This game uses that theme by making each level dependent on different waveforms.

Level 1 uses the square waveform, so the weapons fire a square wave, all the sound effects use a square waveform for the sounds, and the enemies only move up/down/left/right.

Level 2 uses the sawtooth waveform, so the weapons fire a sawtooth wave, all the sound effects use a sawtooth waveform, and the enemies only move diagonal, then straight, diagonal, then straight

Level 3 uses the triangle waveform, so the weapons fire a triangle wave, all the sound effects use a triangle waveform, and the enemies only move diagonally.

Level 4 uses the sine waveform, so the weapons fire a sine wave, all the sound effects use a sine waveform, and the enemies move in curved motions.
